name: Native Initiatives
objective: To promote economic revitalization and community development through financial and technical assistance to certified and emerging Native Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs).
applicant_types: Native American Organizations (includes Indian groups, cooperatives, corporations, partnerships, associations)
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Please visit the CDFI Fund website for information on program accomplishments.  The information can be accessed via www.cdfifund.gov/programs-training/Programs/native-initiatives.
